title: Recommended Web Performance Timings: How long is too long?
summary: There are no clear set rules as to what constitutes a slow pace when loading pages, but there are specific guidelines for indicating content will load (1 second), idling (50ms), animating (16.7ms) and responding to user input (50 to 200ms).
short_title: Recommended Web Performance Timings: How long is too long?
